The Gansu Dongshuiquan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Dongshuiquan area of Zhangye City, Gansu Province

operators: Zhangye City Dongshuiquan Mining Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Zhangye City Dongshuiquan Mining Co Ltd, which holds 100% ownership.
